comments.body: Is this the new generated code? If so, this is still incorrect, you should use the hash of the fully qualified name of `Project`. Otherwise, you can still have predictable collisions of the hash with other classes named `Project`.
I would be happy to improve Contraband later, but we should merge this first since all other Zinc PR's are blocked by various breakages from io, lm etc.
Okay. I suggest you give it a little bit of priority since it's a severe issue that could bite us.
If file is generated then it should be included in .gitingnore (probably whole `contraband-scala` dir). Do I miss something here?
We intentionally include it because there's generated Scala code could still be read by ppl via GitHub etc without understanding the original GraphQL syntax.
